Name: Blueberry Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Blueberry juice and liqueur lengthens and sweetens an otherwise classic Daiquiri.
History: Created in 2002 by yours truly in London, England.
